summary: Changes the player dialogues to be snarky and arrogant.
descriptionHtml:
This mod's purpose is to change the way the player character responds to others.

This mod also adds new conversations, and reaction for the lines that are just too sharp to ignore.Â The new conversations, and reactions are all voiced.

This mod assumes the Dragonborn has the following traits:

Sarcastic and snarky
Arrogant
Sometimes a jerk
Flirty
Has a well hidden golden heart
Narcissistic
Short temper

If you want noble player dialogues, you should checkout Jereme's Immersive Player Dialogues.

This mod is only for English games.

No need to worry about USKP conflicts. I'm including the USKP fixes as well. Just load my mod last in your load order.

This mod in no way or shape changes NPCs or their voicesets or adds new ones. It adds conversations to their conversation list and changes the dialogues you choose.


[size=4]Wonderful people who have helped with this mod so far:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4924599]draconisking
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19004784]Lurren[/url]
[/size]
author: Serioos
